name: Feared by villagers
description: Villagers are not your greatest fans, with them raising their trade prices. Iron Golem's are a bit more forceful with their distaste of you.

actions.command: execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=..10] run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 60
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=..10] run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @p UUID
execute at @s as @e[type=villager,distance=..7] run data merge entity @s {Gossips:[{Target:[I;1,1,1,1],Type:'major_negative',Value:110}]}
execute at @s as @e[type=villager,distance=..7] run data modify entity @s Gossips[{Target:[I;1,1,1,1]}].Target set from entity @p UUID
